summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the preparation of a bond issue proposal for parks and recreation purposes for Seattle and King County, by increasing the 1980 Budget of the Department of Finance General, Account 55197 - Special Project - Bond Issue Planning, and by making a nonreimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the Emergency therefor; and authorizing the Mayor to enter into an inter-local agreement with King County for expenditures related to the Joint Citizen's Committee and staff; and ratifying and confirming prior acts.
